第三章 不定积分 §1. 最筒单的不定积分

1∘ 1^\circ 1∘ 不定积分的概念
若f(x) f(x) f(x)为连续抣数及
F′(x)=f(x) F^{\prime}(x)=f(x) F′(x)=f(x)，则

∫f(x)dx=F(x)+C \int f(x) d x=F(x)+C ∫f(x)dx=F(x)+C

式中CCC为任意常数.

2∘ 2^\circ 2∘不定积分的荃本性质：

(a) d[∫f(x)dx]=f(x)dx;(σ)∫dΦ(x)=Φ(x)+C d\left[\int f(x) d x\right]=f(x) d x ;(\sigma) \int d \Phi(x)=\Phi(x)+C d[∫f(x)dx]=f(x)dx;(σ)∫dΦ(x)=Φ(x)+C;

(b) ∫Af(x)dx=A∫f(x)dx(A= \int A f(x) d x=A \int f(x) d x \quad(A= ∫Af(x)dx=A∫f(x)dx(A= 常数);

© ∫[f(x)+g(x)]dx=∫f(x)dx+∫g(x)dx\int[f(x)+g(x)] d x=\int f(x) d x+\int g(x) d x∫[f(x)+g(x)]dx=∫f(x)dx+∫g(x)dx.

3∘ 3^\circ 3∘ 最箔积分表：

∫x∗dx=xn+1n+1+C(n≠−1)\int x^{*} d x=\frac{x^{n+1}}{n+1}+C \quad(n \neq-1)∫x∗dx=n+1xn+1​+C(n=−1);

I. ∫dxx=ln⁡∣x∣+C(x≠0)\int \frac{d x}{x}=\ln |x|+C(x \neq 0)∫xdx​=ln∣x∣+C(x=0);

I. ∫dx1+x2={arctg⁡x+C,−arcctg⁡x+C;\int \frac{d x}{1+x^{2}}=\left\{\begin{array}{l}\operatorname{arctg} x+C, \\ -\operatorname{arcctg} x+C ;\end{array}\right.∫1+x2dx​={arctgx+C,−arcctgx+C;​

N. ∫dx1−x2=12ln⁡∣1+x1−x∣+C∗\int \frac{d x}{1-x^{2}}=\frac{1}{2} \ln \left|\frac{1+x}{1-x}\right|+C *∫1−x2dx​=21​ln∣∣​1−x1+x​∣∣​+C∗

v. ∫dx1−x2={arcsin⁡x+C; −arccos⁡x+C; \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1-x^{2}}}=\left\{\begin{array}{l}\arcsin x+C \text {; } \\ -\arccos x+C \text {; }\end{array}\right.∫1−x2​dx​={arcsinx+C; −arccosx+C; ​

ท. ∫dxx2±1=ln⁡∣x+x2±1∣+C\int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{x^{2} \pm 1}}=\ln \left|x+\sqrt{x^{2} \pm 1}\right|+C∫x2±1​dx​=ln∣∣​x+x2±1​∣∣​+C; n. ∫axdx=a′ln⁡a+((a>0,a≠1);∫exdx=ex+C\int a^{x} d x=\frac{a^{\prime}}{\ln a}+\left((a>0, a \neq 1) ; \int e^{x} d x=e^{x}+C\right.∫axdx=lnaa′​+((a>0,a=1);∫exdx=ex+C;

v. ∫sin⁡xdx=−cos⁡x+C7\int \sin x d x=-\cos x+C_{7}∫sinxdx=−cosx+C7​

x. ∫cos⁡xdx=sin⁡x+C\int \cos x d x=\sin x+C∫cosxdx=sinx+C

x,∫dxsin⁡2x=−ctg⁡x+Cx, \int \frac{d x}{\sin ^{2} x}=-\operatorname{ctg} x+Cx,∫sin2xdx​=−ctgx+C

x\mathrm{x}x. ∫dxcos⁡2x=tgx+C\int \frac{d x}{\cos ^{2} x}=\mathrm{tg} x+C∫cos2xdx​=tgx+C;

XI .∫sh⁡xdx=ch⁡x+C;. \int \operatorname{sh} x d x=\operatorname{ch} x+C ;.∫shxdx=chx+C;

XI . ∫ch⁡xdx=sh⁡x+C\int \operatorname{ch} x d x=\operatorname{sh} x+C∫chxdx=shx+C;

XV. ∫dxsh⁡2x=−cth⁡x+C7\int \frac{d x}{\operatorname{sh}^{2} x}=-\operatorname{cth} x+C_{7}∫sh2xdx​=−cthx+C7​

XV. ∫dxch⁡2x=th⁡x+C\int \frac{d x}{\operatorname{ch}^{2} x}=\operatorname{th} x+C∫ch2xdx​=thx+C.

4∘ 4^\circ 4∘ 积分的基本击法

(a) 引入新变数法 若

∫f(x)dx=F(x)+C, \int f(x) d x=F(x)+C, ∫f(x)dx=F(x)+C,

则 ∫f(u)du=F(u)+C\int f(u) d u=F(u)+C∫f(u)du=F(u)+C, 式中 u=φ(x)u=\varphi(x)u=φ(x).

(6) 分项积分法 若

f(x)=f1(x)+f2(x). f(x)=f_{1}(x)+f_{2}(x) . f(x)=f1​(x)+f2​(x).

则

∫f(x)dx=∫f1(x)dx+∫f2(x)dx. \int f(x) d x=\int f_{1}(x) d x+\int f_{2}(x) d x . ∫f(x)dx=∫f1​(x)dx+∫f2​(x)dx.(B)

x=φ(t)x=\varphi(t)x=φ(t),式中 φ(t)\varphi(t)φ(t) 及其导函数 φ′(t)\varphi^{\prime}(t)φ′(t) 为连续的,

则俉

∫f(x)dx=∫f(φ(t)]φ′(t)dt. \int f(x) d x=\int f(\varphi(t)] \varphi^{\prime}(t) d t . ∫f(x)dx=∫f(φ(t)]φ′(t)dt.

（「）分部积分法 若 uuu 和 vvv 为 xxx 的可僮分函数,

则

∫udv=uv−∫vdu. \int u d v=u v-\int v d u . ∫udv=uv−∫vdu.

利用最简积分表, 求出下列积分:

本章在炇述习旦及其解答过侱中,
凡出現的函数,
无论是被积函数还是原函数,
均㖵认是在有意义的定义域上进行的.
洌如最简积分表中 I 里
当n⩽−2n \leqslant-2n⩽−2 时,
要求x≠0x \neq 0x=0; NNN中
要求∣x∣≠1;N|x| \neq 1 ; N∣x∣=1;N中
要求∣x∣<1;|x|<1 ;∣x∣<1;
以及nnn中, 当敢负号时要求
∣x∣>1 |x|>1 ∣x∣>1等等，就未加声明。
在解题中也有相当多的类似情况。
因此，如无特别声明，在一般情形下，
这些定义域是很容易被读者确定的，
此处就不再予以一一指明

  1. 证明：若
∫f(x)dx=F(x)+C \int f(x) d x=F(x)+C ∫f(x)dx=F(x)+C

则

∫f(ax+b)dx=1aF(ax+b)+C(a≠0) \int f(a x+b) d x=\frac{1}{a} F(a x+b)+C \quad(a \neq 0) ∫f(ax+b)dx=a1​F(ax+b)+C(a=0)

证：由∫f(x)dx=F(x)+C \int f(x) d x=F(x)+C ∫f(x)dx=F(x)+C得知F′(x)=f(x) F^{\prime}(x)=f(x) F′(x)=f(x).
因而有F′(ax+b)=f(ax+b) F^{\prime}(a x+b)=f(a x+b) F′(ax+b)=f(ax+b),
且ddx[1aF(ax+b)] \frac{d}{d x}\left[\frac{1}{a} F(a x+b)\right] dxd​[a1​F(ax+b)],
于是

 F′(ax+b)=ddx[1aF(ax+b)]=f(ax+b) \begin{aligned} ~& F^{\prime}(a x+b) \\ =& \frac{d}{d x}\left[\frac{1}{a} F(a x+b)\right] \\ =& f(ax+b) \end{aligned}  ==​F′(ax+b)dxd​[a1​F(ax+b)]f(ax+b)​

所以

∫f(ax+b)dx=1aF(ax+b)+c \int f(a x+b) d x=\frac{1}{a} F(a x+b)+c ∫f(ax+b)dx=a1​F(ax+b)+c

 ∫dxex+e−r=∫d(ex)1+(ex)2=arctg⁡(ex)+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{d x}{e^{x}+e^{-r}} \\ =& \int \frac{d\left(e^{x}\right)}{1+\left(e^{x}\right)^{2}} \\ =& \operatorname{arctg}\left(e^{x}\right)+C \end{aligned}  ==​∫ex+e−rdx​∫1+(ex)2d(ex)​arctg(ex)+C​
  1. ∫dx1+ϵ2x\displaystyle \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1+\epsilon^{2 x}}}∫1+ϵ2x​dx​
 ∫dx1+e2r=−∫d(e−r)1+(e−r)2=−ln⁡(e−x+1+e−2r)+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{d x}{\sqrt{1+e^{2 r}}} \\ =& -\int \frac{d\left(e^{-r}\right)}{\sqrt{1+\left(e^{-r}\right)^{2}}} \\ =& -\ln \left(e^{-x}+\sqrt{1+e^{-2 r}}\right)+C \end{aligned}  ==​∫1+e2r​dx​−∫1+(e−r)2​d(e−r)​−ln(e−x+1+e−2r​)+C​
  1. ∫ln⁡2xxdx\displaystyle \int \frac{\ln ^{2} x}{x} d x∫xln2x​dx
 ∫ln⁡2xxdx=∫ln⁡2xd(ln⁡x)=13ln⁡3x+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{\ln ^{2} x}{x} d x \\ =& \int \ln ^{2} x d(\ln x) \\ =& \frac{1}{3} \ln ^{3} x+C \end{aligned}  ==​∫xln2x​dx∫ln2xd(lnx)31​ln3x+C​
  1. ∫dxxln⁡xln⁡(ln⁡x)\displaystyle \int \frac{d x}{x \ln x \ln (\ln x)}∫xlnxln(lnx)dx​
 ∫dxxln⁡xln⁡(ln⁡x)=∫d(ln⁡x)ln⁡xln⁡(ln⁡x)=∫d(ln⁡(ln⁡x))ln⁡(ln⁡x)=ln⁡∣ln⁡(ln⁡x)∣+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{d x}{x \ln x \ln (\ln x)} \\ =& \int \frac{d(\ln x)}{\ln x \ln (\ln x)} \\ =& \int \frac{d(\ln (\ln x))}{\ln (\ln x)} \\ =& \ln |\ln (\ln x)|+C \end{aligned}  ===​∫xlnxln(lnx)dx​∫lnxln(lnx)d(lnx)​∫ln(lnx)d(ln(lnx))​ln∣ln(lnx)∣+C​
  1. ∫sin⁡5xcos⁡xdx\displaystyle \int \sin ^{5} x \cos x d x∫sin5xcosxdx
 ∫sin⁡5xcos⁡xdx=∫sin⁡5xd(sin⁡x)=16sin⁡6x+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \sin ^{5} x \cos x d x \\ =& \int \sin ^{5} x d(\sin x) \\ =& \frac{1}{6} \sin ^{6} x+C \end{aligned}  ==​∫sin5xcosxdx∫sin5xd(sinx)61​sin6x+C​
  1. ∫sin⁡xcos⁡3xdx\displaystyle \int \frac{\sin x}{\sqrt{\cos ^{3} x}} d x∫cos3x​sinx​dx
 ∫sin⁡xcos⁡3xdx=−∫(cos⁡x)−32d(cos⁡x)=2cos⁡x+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{\sin x}{\sqrt{\cos ^{3} x}} d x \\ =& -\int(\cos x)^{-\frac{3}{2}} d(\cos x) \\ =& \frac{2}{\sqrt{\cos x}}+C \end{aligned}  ==​∫cos3x​sinx​dx−∫(cosx)−23​d(cosx)cosx​2​+C​
  1. ∫tg⁡xdx\displaystyle \int \operatorname{tg} x d x∫tgxdx
 ∫tg⁡xdx=∫sin⁡xcos⁡xdx=−∫d(cos⁡x)cos⁡x=−ln⁡∣cos⁡x∣+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \operatorname{tg} x d x \\ =& \int \frac{\sin x}{\cos x} d x \\ =& -\int \frac{d(\cos x)}{\cos x} \\ =& -\ln |\cos x|+C \end{aligned}  ===​∫tgxdx∫cosxsinx​dx−∫cosxd(cosx)​−ln∣cosx∣+C​
  1. ∫ctg⁡dx\displaystyle \int \operatorname{ctg} d x∫ctgdx
 ∫ctg⁡xdx=∫cos⁡xsin⁡xdx=∫d(sin⁡x)sin⁡x=ln⁡∣sin⁡x∣+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \operatorname{ctg} x d x \\ =& \int \frac{\cos x}{\sin x} d x \\ =& \int \frac{d(\sin x)}{\sin x} \\ =& \ln |\sin x|+C \end{aligned}  ===​∫ctgxdx∫sinxcosx​dx∫sinxd(sinx)​ln∣sinx∣+C​
  1. ∫sin⁡x+cos⁡xsin⁡x−cos⁡x3dx\displaystyle \int \frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt[3]{\sin x-\cos x}} d x∫3sinx−cosx​sinx+cosx​dx
 ∫sin⁡x+cos⁡xsin⁡x−cos⁡x3dx=∫(sin⁡x−cos⁡x)−13d(sin⁡x−cos⁡x)=32(sin⁡x−cos⁡x)23+C=321−sin⁡2x3+C. \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{\sin x+\cos x}{\sqrt[3]{\sin x-\cos x}} d x \\ =& \int(\sin x-\cos x)^{-\frac{1}{3}} d(\sin x-\cos x) \\ =& \frac{3}{2} \sqrt[3]{(\sin x-\cos x)^{2}}+C \\ =& \frac{3}{2} \sqrt[3]{1-\sin 2 x}+C . \end{aligned}  ===​∫3sinx−cosx​sinx+cosx​dx∫(sinx−cosx)−31​d(sinx−cosx)23​3(sinx−cosx)2​+C23​31−sin2x​+C.​
  1. ∫sin⁡xcos⁡xa2sin⁡2x+b2cos⁡2xdx\displaystyle \int \frac{\sin x \cos x}{\sqrt{a^{2} \sin ^{2} x+b^{2} \cos ^{2} x}} d x∫a2sin2x+b2cos2x​sinxcosx​dx

当∣a∣=∣b∣≠0|a|=|b| \neq 0∣a∣=∣b∣=0时

 ∫sin⁡xcos⁡xa2sin⁡2x+b2cos⁡2xdx=1∣a∣∫sin⁡xcos⁡xdx=12∣a∣sin⁡2x+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{\sin x \cos x}{\sqrt{a^{2} \sin ^{2} x+b^{2} \cos ^{2} x}} d x \\ =& \frac{1}{|a|} \int \sin x \cos x d x \\ =& \frac{1}{2|a|} \sin ^{2} x+C \end{aligned}  ==​∫a2sin2x+b2cos2x​sinxcosx​dx∣a∣1​∫sinxcosxdx2∣a∣1​sin2x+C​

当∣a∣≠∣b∣|a| \neq|b|∣a∣=∣b∣时

 ∫sin⁡xcos⁡xa2sin⁡2x+b2cos⁡2xdx=12∫d(sin⁡2x)(a2−b2)sin⁡2x+b2=1a2−b2(a2−b2)sin⁡2x+b2+C=a2sin⁡2x+b2cos⁡2xa2−b2+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{\sin x \cos x}{\sqrt{a^{2} \sin ^{2} x+b^{2} \cos ^{2} x}} d x \\ =& \frac{1}{2} \int \frac{d\left(\sin ^{2} x\right)}{\sqrt{\left(a^{2}-b^{2}\right) \sin ^{2} x+b^{2}}} \\ =& \frac{1}{a^{2}-b^{2}} \sqrt{\left(a^{2}-b^{2}\right) \sin ^{2} x+b^{2}}+C \\ =& \frac{\sqrt{a^{2} \sin ^{2} x+b^{2} \cos ^{2} x}}{a^{2}-b^{2}}+C \end{aligned}  ===​∫a2sin2x+b2cos2x​sinxcosx​dx21​∫(a2−b2)sin2x+b2​d(sin2x)​a2−b21​(a2−b2)sin2x+b2​+Ca2−b2a2sin2x+b2cos2x​​+C​
  1. ∫dxsin⁡2xctg⁡x1\displaystyle \int \frac{d x}{\sin ^{2} x \sqrt[1]{\operatorname{ctg} x}}∫sin2x1ctgx​dx​
 ∫dxsh⁡x=∫12ch⁡2x2th⁡x2dx=∫d(th⁡x2)th⁡x2=ln⁡∣thx2∣+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{d x}{\operatorname{sh} x} \\ =& \int \frac{\frac{1}{2 \operatorname{ch}^{2} \frac{x}{2}}}{\operatorname{th} \frac{x}{2}} d x \\ =& \int \frac{d\left(\operatorname{th} \frac{x}{2}\right)}{\operatorname{th} \frac{x}{2}} \\ =& \ln \left|\mathbf{t h} \frac{x}{2}\right|+C \end{aligned}  ===​∫shxdx​∫th2x​2ch22x​1​​dx∫th2x​d(th2x​)​ln∣∣​th2x​∣∣​+C​
  1. ∫dxch⁡x\displaystyle \int \frac{d x}{\operatorname{ch} x}∫chxdx​
 ∫dxch⁡x=∫2dxer+e−r=2∫d(er)1+(er)2=2arctg⁡(ex)+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{d x}{\operatorname{ch} x} \\ =& \int \frac{2 d x}{e^{r}+e^{-r}} \\ =& 2 \int \frac{d\left(e^{r}\right)}{1+\left(e^{r}\right)^{2}} \\ =& 2 \operatorname{arctg}\left(e^{x}\right)+C \end{aligned}  ===​∫chxdx​∫er+e−r2dx​2∫1+(er)2d(er)​2arctg(ex)+C​
  1. ∫sh⁡xch⁡xsh⁡4x+ch⁡4xdx\displaystyle \int \frac{\operatorname{sh} x \operatorname{ch} x}{\sqrt{\operatorname{sh}^{4} x+\operatorname{ch}^{4} x}} d x∫sh4x+ch4x​shxchx​dx
 sh⁡4x+ch⁡4x=(sh⁡2x+ch⁡2x)2−2sh⁡2xch⁡2x=ch⁡22x−12sh⁡22x=1+ch⁡22x2 \begin{aligned} ~& \operatorname{sh}^{4} x+\operatorname{ch}^{4} x \\ =& \left(\operatorname{sh}^{2} x+\operatorname{ch}^{2} x\right)^{2}-2 \operatorname{sh}^{2} x \operatorname{ch}^{2} x \\ =& \operatorname{ch}^{2} 2 x-\frac{1}{2} \operatorname{sh}^{2} 2 x \\ =& \frac{1+\operatorname{ch}^{2} 2 x}{2} \end{aligned}  ===​sh4x+ch4x(sh2x+ch2x)2−2sh2xch2xch22x−21​sh22x21+ch22x​​

所以, 得

 ∫sh⁡xch⁡xsh⁡4x+ch⁡4xdx=∫14d(ch⁡2x)121+ch⁡22x=122ln⁡(ch⁡2x+1+ch⁡22x−C1=122ln⁡(ch⁡2x2+sh⁡4x+ch⁡4x)+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{\operatorname{sh} x \operatorname{ch} x}{\sqrt{\operatorname{sh}^{4} x+\operatorname{ch}^{4} x}} d x \\ =& \int \frac{\frac{1}{4} d(\operatorname{ch} 2 x)}{\frac{1}{\sqrt{2}} \sqrt{1+\operatorname{ch}^{2} 2 x}} \\ =& \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{2}} \ln \left(\operatorname{ch} 2 x+\sqrt{1+\operatorname{ch}^{2} 2 x}-C_{1}\right. \\ =& \frac{1}{2 \sqrt{2}} \ln \left(\frac{\operatorname{ch} 2 x}{\sqrt{2}}+\sqrt{\operatorname{sh}^{4} x+\operatorname{ch}^{4} x}\right)+C \end{aligned}  ===​∫sh4x+ch4x​shxchx​dx∫2​1​1+ch22x​41​d(ch2x)​22​1​ln(ch2x+1+ch22x​−C1​22​1​ln(2​ch2x​+sh4x+ch4x​)+C​
  1. ∫dxch⁡2x⋅th2x3\displaystyle \int \frac{d x}{\operatorname{ch}^{2} x \cdot \sqrt[3]{\mathrm{th}^{2} x}}∫ch2x⋅3th2x​dx​
 ∫dxch⁡2x⋅th⁡2x3=∫(th⁡x)−23d(th⁡x)=3th3x+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{d x}{\operatorname{ch}^{2} x \cdot \sqrt[3]{\operatorname{th}^{2} x}} \\ =& \int(\operatorname{th} x)^{-\frac{2}{3}} d(\operatorname{th} x) \\ =& 3 \sqrt[3]{\mathrm{th}} x+C \end{aligned}  ==​∫ch2x⋅3th2x​dx​∫(thx)−32​d(thx)33th​x+C​
  1. ∫arctg⁡x1+x2dx\displaystyle \int \frac{\operatorname{arctg} x}{1+x^{2}} d x∫1+x2arctgx​dx
 ∫arctg⁡x1+x2dx=∫arctg⁡xd(arctg⁡x)=12(arctg⁡x)2+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{\operatorname{arctg} x}{1+x^{2}} d x \\ =& \int \operatorname{arctg} x d(\operatorname{arctg} x) \\ =& \frac{1}{2}(\operatorname{arctg} x)^{2}+C \end{aligned}  ==​∫1+x2arctgx​dx∫arctgxd(arctgx)21​(arctgx)2+C​
  1. ∫dx(arcsin⁡x)21−x2\displaystyle \int \frac{d x}{(\arcsin x)^{2} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}}∫(arcsinx)21−x2​dx​
 ∫dx(arcsin⁡x)21−x2=∫d(arcsin⁡x)(arcsin⁡x)2=−1arcsin⁡x+C \begin{aligned} ~& \int \frac{d x}{(\arcsin x)^{2} \sqrt{1-x^{2}}} \\ =& \int \frac{d(\arcsin x)}{(\arcsin x)^{2}} \\ =& -\frac{1}{\arcsin x}+C \end{aligned}  ==​∫(arcsinx)21−x2​dx​∫(arcsinx)2d(arcsinx)​−arcsinx1​+C​
